author: Sunny Kim
title: Acting DHS head McAleenan walks out of immigration conference as protests drown him out
description: McAleenan, who was a keynote speaker at the conference, was met by protesters in the crowd who yelled, "When immigrants are under attack, what do we do? Stand up, fight back!"
content:
Acting Secretary of Homeland Security Kevin McAleenan on Monday walked out of an immigration conference in Washington after multiple attempts to speak over protesters.
